comment.author: 81602598@N00
comment._content:
Is this the Coolangatta Estate near Berry on the NSW South Coast? I know that property reasonably well, but I'm not certain this is it. Can the museum confirm the location?

I know the current owners of the property and they would be very interested in this picture.

comment.author: 81602598@N00
comment._content: I sent a copy to the owners, they have confirmed that this is the Coolangatta Estate near Berry NSW. They estimate that the photo was taken from what is now Bolong Road, near the turnoff to Shoalhaven Heads.
